```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
grouped_data$length <- nchar(grouped_data$tcr)
```


```{r}
ggplot(grouped_data[grouped_data$length > 10 & grouped_data$length < 19,], aes(x = factor(length), y = mean_score)) +
  geom_violin(fill = "#00FFFF") +  # 设置小提琴图填充颜色为青色
  geom_boxplot(width = 0.1, color = "black") +  # 添加箱线图，设置宽度和颜色
  labs(x = "Length", y = "Mean Score") +  # 设置x轴和y轴标签
  theme_minimal() +  # 使用最小主题
  theme(legend.position = "none")  # 移除图例
```
